column5: Beautiful new 2900 square-foot four bedroom house with a swimming pool. Rent our entire upstairs portion that can sleep up to 7 with a private bedroom, loft and private bathroom. 2 queen beds, 1 twin bed, 1 queen air mattress available, great for kids. Share kitchen. Laundry available. Use of pool. Boat available for additional fee. Canyon Lake Marina. Seats 10
column8: Beautiful Home w/ Pool and Boat Use
